EmailTemplate.name: 2019.10.30 - FedGov - Cold and Flu - FR.FedGov Email - Cold and Flu - FR
EmailTemplate.subject: Protégez-vous contre les virus au bureau
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Consultez l'offre en ligne <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/FR/search/pages/browse/Prot%C3%A9gez-vous-contre-les-virus/_/N-eo4?showMoreIds=10001?cmp=EBFGCOLDFLU19FR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> La saison du rhume et de la grippe est à nos portes! Faites provision de produits qui protègent contre la propagation des germes. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/FR/search/pages/browse/Breakroom/_/N-enl?cmp=EBFGCOLDFLU19FR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Salle de repos Magasiner <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/FR/search/pages/browse/Breakroom/_/N-enl?cmp=EBFGCOLDFLU19FR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/FR/search/pages/browse/Tissues-and-hand-sanitizer/_/N-enm?cmp=EBFGCOLDFLU19FR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Lingettes et nettoyant desinfectantes Magasiner <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/FR/search/pages/browse/Tissues-and-hand-sanitizer/_/N-enm?cmp=EBFGCOLDFLU19FR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Tout voir <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/FR/search/pages/browse/Prot%C3%A9gez-vous-contre-les-virus/_/N-eo4?showMoreIds=10001?cmp=EBFGCOLDFLU19FR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Service à la clientèle <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Modalites <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Confidentialite <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> grandandtoy.com/gov <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/fr/sites/government/default.aspx]]>
Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-511-4534
